title: How to Freeze Green Beans
description:
Learn How to Freeze Green Beans with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Green-Beans

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: two fries green beans start by trimming off the ends and cutting the beans to your desired length then blanch the green beans in boiling water for three minutes and immediately transfer them to a bowl of ice water so they stop cooking next drain the water Pat the green beans dry with a paper towel finally place the green beans in a sealable freezer bag and store them in the freezer for up to nine monthstwo fries green beans start by trimming off the ends and cutting the beans to your desired length then blanch the green beans in boiling water for three minutes and immediately transfer them to a bowl of ice water so they stop cooking next drain the water Pat the green beans dry with a paper towel finally place the green beans in a sealable freezer bag and store them in the freezer for up to nine months

title: How to Freeze Kale
description:
Learn How to Freeze Kale with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Kale

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: two fries kale start by washing the kale under cool running water and trim the stems of the leaves then bring a pot of water to a boil and place the leaves in the water to cook for 2.5 minutes immediately remove the leaves from the pot and place them in a bowl of ice water for 2.5 minutes before removing them to dry next place the kale in a resealable bag and press out as much air as possible before sealing it label the bags and place them in the freezer to use as neededtwo fries kale start by washing the kale under cool running water and trim the stems of the leaves then bring a pot of water to a boil and place the leaves in the water to cook for 2.5 minutes immediately remove the leaves from the pot and place them in a bowl of ice water for 2.5 minutes before removing them to dry next place the kale in a resealable bag and press out as much air as possible before sealing it label the bags and place them in the freezer to use as needed

title: How to Freeze Onions
description:
Learn how to freeze onions with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Onions

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to freeze onions start by peeling and chopping the onions into the preferred size but be sure to keep the pieces larger than .5 inches to prevent ice from forming then place the onions in a large resealable freezer bag in a single flat layer be sure to squeeze all of the air out of the bag before you seal it and mark the bag with the date that you froze them to ensure freshness place the bag in the freezer and use the onions as neededto freeze onions start by peeling and chopping the onions into the preferred size but be sure to keep the pieces larger than .5 inches to prevent ice from forming then place the onions in a large resealable freezer bag in a single flat layer be sure to squeeze all of the air out of the bag before you seal it and mark the bag with the date that you froze them to ensure freshness place the bag in the freezer and use the onions as needed

title: How to Freeze Pineapple
description:
Learn how to freeze pineapple with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Pineapple

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: if you need to freeze pineapple cut off the top and bottoms of the pineapple with a sharp knife then carefully slice off the skins and cut out the core you can dice the pineapple cut it into large circles or cut it into smaller squares place the pineapple in a single layer onto a baking sheet lined with parchment or wax paper and place the baking sheet in the freezer overnight after the pineapple is frozen place it into a freezer bag or airtight container and store the frozen pineapple for up to six monthsif you need to freeze pineapple cut off the top and bottoms of the pineapple with a sharp knife then carefully slice off the skins and cut out the core you can dice the pineapple cut it into large circles or cut it into smaller squares place the pineapple in a single layer onto a baking sheet lined with parchment or wax paper and place the baking sheet in the freezer overnight after the pineapple is frozen place it into a freezer bag or airtight container and store the frozen pineapple for up to six months

title: How to Fry an Egg
description:
This quick video will show you #howto fry an egg!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Fry-an-Egg

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to fry the perfect egg heat 1/2 a tablespoon of oil or butter in a small pan on medium low heat when the oil or butter is hot but not browned carefully crack an egg into the pan let the egg cook for 1 to 3 minutes until you can't see the bottom of the pan through the white place the lid on the pan and lower the heat for a runny yolk let it cook for about 5 more minutes until you can poke the yolk without any uncooked egg coming away for a harder egg let it cook for one to two minutes more lift the egg out with a spatula and enjoyto fry the perfect egg heat 1/2 a tablespoon of oil or butter in a small pan on medium low heat when the oil or butter is hot but not browned carefully crack an egg into the pan let the egg cook for 1 to 3 minutes until you can't see the bottom of the pan through the white place the lid on the pan and lower the heat for a runny yolk let it cook for about 5 more minutes until you can poke the yolk without any uncooked egg coming away for a harder egg let it cook for one to two minutes more lift the egg out with a spatula and enjoy

title: How to Grill Filet Mignon
description:
Learn how to grill filet mignon with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Grill-Filet-Mignon

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to get the best flavor from your filet mignon brush it with a bit of oil before grilling then if you have a charcoal grill create a hot side and a cool side with your coals cook the filet over high heat for 2-5 minutes alternatively to cook a filet mignon on a gas grill cook the fillet until the internal temperature reaches 120 to 160 degrees fahrenheit either way once the fillet is done cooking allow it to rest for five to ten minutes before cutting into it to learn how to make a perfect medium rare fillet keep readingto get the best flavor from your filet mignon brush it with a bit of oil before grilling then if you have a charcoal grill create a hot side and a cool side with your coals cook the filet over high heat for 2-5 minutes alternatively to cook a filet mignon on a gas grill cook the fillet until the internal temperature reaches 120 to 160 degrees fahrenheit either way once the fillet is done cooking allow it to rest for five to ten minutes before cutting into it to learn how to make a perfect medium rare fillet keep reading to get the best flavor from your filet mignon brush it with a bit of oil before grilling then if you have a charcoal grill create a hot side and a cool side with your coals cook the filet over high heat for 2-5 minutes alternatively to cook a filet mignon on a gas grill cook the fillet until the internal temperature reaches 120 to 160 degrees fahrenheit either way once the fillet is done cooking allow it to rest for five to ten minutes before cutting into it to learn how to make a perfect medium rare fillet keep reading

title: How to Grill Lobster Tails
description:
Learn how to grill lobster tails with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Grill-Lobster-Tails

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to grill lobster tails first preheat your grill over medium heat use kitchen shears to cut through the top of the shell on each tail then use a knife to cut down the length of the meat in each tail without cutting all the way through the bottom stick a skewer through each lobster tail lengthwise so the tail doesn't curl up on the grill brush the tails with melted butter then season them with salt pepper lemon juice and your other favorite seasonings place the lobster tails on the grill flesh side down and grill them for around 6 minutes or until they're slightly charred flip the tails over and cook them until they're cooked through about 5 minutes finally transfer the lobster tails to a plate and serveto grill lobster tails first preheat your grill over medium heat use kitchen shears to cut through the top of the shell on each tail then use a knife to cut down the length of the meat in each tail without cutting all the way through the bottom stick a skewer through each lobster tail lengthwise so the tail doesn't curl up on the grill brush the tails with melted butter then season them with salt pepper lemon juice and your other favorite seasonings place the lobster tails on the grill flesh side down and grill them for around 6 minutes or until they're slightly charred flip the tails over and cook them until they're cooked through about 5 minutes finally transfer the lobster tails to a plate and serve

title: How to Grow a Tomato Plant
description:
Learn How to Grow a Tomato Plant with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Grow-a-Tomato-Plant

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to grow a tomato plant start by planting a baby tomato plant in a sunny spot with soil that's rich in nutrients then set up a tomato cage around the plant to support it as it grows water the plant one to two times a week until the plant matures and the water gets hotter when that happens water the plant deeply three times a week after a couple of weeks add a layer of mulch on the plant to help keep the soil moist you can also apply a small amount of vegetable fertilizer to help your plant grow healthy and strongto grow a tomato plant start by planting a baby tomato plant in a sunny spot with soil that's rich in nutrients then set up a tomato cage around the plant to support it as it grows water the plant one to two times a week until the plant matures and the water gets hotter when that happens water the plant deeply three times a week after a couple of weeks add a layer of mulch on the plant to help keep the soil moist you can also apply a small amount of vegetable fertilizer to help your plant grow healthy and strong
